document.full_text: niger's government will hire 450 doctors this year, a government spokesman said on thursday, a drive that would double the number of doctors in the poor west african nation after an eight-year hiring freeze.
document.title: niger to double current number of doctors
lines_and_colors: niger's government will hire 450 doctors this year, a government spokesman said on thursday, a drive that would double the number of doctors in the poor west african nation after an eight-year hiring freeze.
